ai-patthana15.11:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.11:1.1_0: for the sake of a trainee, not for the sake of a trainee, or for the sake of a trainee, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.11:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.11:2.1_0: for one who isn’t included in rules or cause, conditioned by reasons.
ai-patthana15.11:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.11:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
